translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

In response to Your Lordship Abreu’s official letter, I hereby send the contestation with which I believe you will be satisfied. I return the letter from the same Abreu.

God keep Your Lordship. To citizen Domingos José de Almeida Secretary of the Treasury Antônio Vicente da Fontoura Bagé, February 21, 1842.

Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic To citizen Domingos José de Almeida Your Residence. From the Minister of the Treasury.
